item.title: 这家瑞士私人银行看好英国
item.description:
在《Merryn Talks Money》节目中，Union Bancaire Privee 的彼得-金塞拉（Peter Kinsella）解释了为什么英国消费者和大选是关键原因。【原文：

On Merryn Talks Money, Peter Kinsella of Union Bancaire Privee explains why UK consumers and the election are key reasons.

】

item.title: 库里首席执行官警告工党，最低工资飙升有损创造就业机会
item.description: Currys Plc 首席执行官亚历克斯-鲍尔多克（Alex Baldock）表示，英国新政府应确保最低工资的提高不会使雇佣更多工人的成本过高。【原文：A new UK government should ensure that increases in the minimum wage don’t make hiring more workers prohibitively costly, according to Currys Plc Chief Executive Officer Alex Baldock.】

item.title: 尽管观察名单发出警告，日元仍牢牢受制于干预措施
item.description: 策略师们表示，尽管美国对日本的外汇做法发出了警告，但通过干预来支持日元的风险依然存在。【原文：The risk of intervention to support the yen remains alive and well despite a warning shot from the US about Japan’s foreign-exchange practices, strategists said.】

item.title: 建造商路王警告违约风险
item.description: 中国开发商路劲基础设施有限公司（Road King Infrastructure Ltd.）警告投资者，如果他们不接受该公司提出的以折扣价回购部分债券并给予该公司更多时间偿还剩余债务的建议，该公司可能会违约。【原文：Chinese developer Road King Infrastructure Ltd. is warning investors that it may default if they don’t accept its proposals to buy some bonds back at discounts and give the company more time to pay back the rest of the debt.】

item.title: 印度市场热点：私人银行卷土重来
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 布拉德称最新美国 CPI 指数燃起 9 月降息希望
item.description: 圣路易斯联邦储备银行前行长詹姆斯-布拉德（James Bullard）表示，尽管最新的通胀数据燃起了9月份降息的希望，但他预计美国货币政策放松的步伐将十分缓慢。【原文：Former Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis President James Bullard said he expects the pace of US monetary policy easing to be slow, although the latest inflation print sparks hope for a September interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 万科考虑通过长租房地产信托基金募集 10 亿元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国万科企业股份有限公司计划通过房地产投资信托基金将其长期租赁业务上市，以筹集约 10 亿元人民币（1.38 亿美元）的资金，从而获得更多的流动资金。【原文：China Vanke Co. plans to raise about 1 billion yuan ($138 million) by listing its long-term rental business via a real estate investment trust as the company seeks to generate more liquidity according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 皮尔巴拉矿业公司可能将澳大利亚矿山的锂产量增加一倍
item.description: 纯锂生产商皮尔巴拉矿业有限公司（Pilbara Minerals Ltd.）正在考虑将其澳大利亚主要项目的精矿产量翻番的计划，理由是相信这种关键电池金属的价格在经历了2023年的暴跌后已趋于稳定。【原文：Lithium pure-play Pilbara Minerals Ltd. is considering plans to double output of concentrate from its major Australian project, citing confidence that prices in the key battery metal have stabilized after 2023’s slump.】

item.title: 日本监管机构准备就客户违规行为处罚 MUFG 单位
item.description: 据知情人士透露，日本监管机构计划最早于周一对三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Japan’s regulator plans to penalize a Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc. unit and two joint ventures as early as Monday for breaching client confidentiality rules, according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国的猪肉调查是对苦苦挣扎的欧盟农民的又一打击
item.description: 中国对欧盟猪肉征收关税的威胁是欧洲大陆陷入困境的猪肉业最不需要的东西。【原文：The threat of China slapping tariffs on the European Union’s pork is the last thing the continent’s beleaguered industry needs.】

item.title: 上海股指将跌破关键心理价位
item.description: 由于对中国经济复苏和地缘政治紧张局势的担忧继续拖累市场情绪，上海上市股票指数有望收盘跌破关键心理价位。【原文：A gauge of Shanghai-listed stocks was poised to close below a key psychological level as concerns over China’s economic recovery and geopolitical tensions continue to weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 韩国与国民年金将扩大外汇互换规模至 500 亿美元
item.description: 在韩元贬值至两个月低点之际，韩国央行和财政部与国民年金局达成一致，同意扩大货币互换交易的规模。【原文：South Korea’s central bank and finance ministry agreed with the National Pension Service to expand the size of a currency swap deal, as the won weakened to a two-month low.】

item.title: 中国房地产销售前景逊于评级公司预期
item.description: 两家全球信用评级公司下调了对中国房地产市场的预期，因为房价加速下滑阻碍了中国拯救房地产行业的努力。【原文：Two global credit ratings firms lowered their forecasts for China’s property market, as an accelerating slump in home prices hampers the country’s efforts to rescue the sector.】

item.title: 中国人民银行给予人民币四月以来最强力提振以控制跌势
item.description: 由于美元走强使人民币接近政策禁区，中国加大了对人民币的支持力度，以控制人民币的跌势。【原文：China boosted its support for the yuan in a bid to manage its decline as broad strength in the dollar kept the currency close to a policy no-go area.】

item.title: 花旗集团的生前预嘱计划被 FDIC 认定为存在缺陷
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国最高监管机构认为花旗集团的假定清盘蓝图存在不足，这对首席执行官简-弗雷泽多年来改善银行风险控制的努力是一个打击。【原文：A top US regulator has found Citigroup Inc.’s blueprint for a hypothetical wind-down to be lacking, according to people familiar with the matter, a blow to Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser’s multiyear bid to improve the bank’s risk controls.】

item.title: 对冲基金 Arrowpoint 吸引 CPPIB 和淡马锡成为主力投资者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，千禧管理亚洲公司（Millennium Management Asia）前高管乔纳森-熊（Jonathan Xiong）的新对冲基金 pod-shop 已获得加拿大养老金计划投资委员会（CPPIB）和新加坡淡马锡控股公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.【原文：Former Millennium Management Asia executive Jonathan Xiong’s new hedge fund pod-shop has signed up Canada Pension Plan Investment Board (CPPIB) and a unit of Singapore’s Temasek Holdings Pte. as additional backers, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 台湾三重紧缩政策缩减流动性指标
item.description: 台湾的三重紧缩因素正促使银行以有史以来最快的速度缩减购买中央银行存款的规模，这表明市场流动性正在萎缩。【原文：A triple whammy of tightening factors in Taiwan is pushing banks to scale back purchases of central bank deposits at the fastest pace on record, a sign that market liquidity is shrinking.】

item.title: 茅台将把中国第一大股票的桂冠拱手让给工商银行
item.description: 贵州茅台酒股份有限公司（Kweichow Moutai Co., Ltd.）似乎准备将中国最有价值的在岸股票的宝座拱手让给中国工商银行股份有限公司（Industrial and Commercial Bank Ltd.），因为这家白酒生产商正在努力应对批发价格的下跌。【原文：Kweichow Moutai Co. looks poised to lose its spot as China’s most valuable onshore stock to Industrial and Commercial Bank of China Ltd., as the baijiu maker grapples with tumbling wholesale prices.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事亚洲
item.description: 早上好。美国将日本列入货币观察名单。日元收于 34 年新低。华尔街交易员对股票买盘表现出疲态。市场动态如下。【原文：Good morning. The US adds Japan to its currency watchlist. The yen closes at a fresh 34-year low. Wall Street traders show signs of fatigue on stock buying. Here’s what’s moving markets. — Isabelle Lee】

item.title: 美国石油库存减少激励多头，石油将实现单周上涨
item.description: 由于美国库存水平意外下降以及需求强劲的迹象表明，世界第一大石油消费国的经济状况良好，石油连续两周上涨。【原文：Oil headed for a back-to-back weekly gain as a surprise draw in US inventory levels and signs of robust demand signaled buoyant conditions in the world’s top oil consumer.】

item.title: Citibanamex 调查报告以最后的悲观预测向我们告别
item.description: 墨西哥花旗银行（Citibanamex）的调查报告最后一次以其标志性品牌发布，因为母公司花旗银行准备在拟议的本地部门首次公开募股之前分拆业务。【原文：Mexico’s Citibanamex survey was published under its emblematic branding one last time, as parent company Citi prepares to split operations ahead of a proposed IPO of the local unit.】

item.title: 中国开发商面临清盘案决定成败的一周
item.description: 下周，四家违约的中国开发商将在香港法院就清算要求举行听证会，这标志着该行业有史以来最繁忙的清算阶段之一。【原文：Four defaulted Chinese developers are headed into Hong Kong court hearings on liquidation demands next week, marking one of the busiest such stretches ever for the sector.】

item.title: 主要美元指数飙升，收于年内最高水平
item.description: 由于美联储仍维持高利率，美元受益于此，衡量美元强弱的一个关键指标当天收盘创下年内最高收盘水平。【原文：A key gauge of the dollar’s strength ended the day at the highest closing level of the year as the US currency benefits from the Federal Reserve’s still-high interest rates.】

item.title: 韩国 "后台 "已为推动债券指数纳入做好准备
item.description: 所谓的韩国金融市场后台表示，韩国政府已为今年将主权债券纳入重要的全球基准做好了一切准备。【原文：The so-called back office of South Korea’s financial markets says it’s all set for the government’s push to get sovereign bonds into a key global benchmark this year.】

item.title: 亚洲股市将追随美国股市走低，日元成为关注焦点：市场综述
item.description: 由于美国股市在反弹至历史高位后出现买方疲劳迹象，多数亚洲股市准备下跌。在通胀数据公布之前，日元成为市场关注的焦点。【原文：Most Asian equity markets were poised to drop as US stocks fell amid signs of buyer fatigue after a rally to record highs. The yen was in focus ahead of inflation data that could draw a line under a six-day slump.】

item.title: MSCI 继续将韩国列为新兴市场，同时禁止做空
item.description: 在卖空禁令抵消了韩国争取升级为发达市场的努力之后，韩国一如预期仍被摩根士丹利资本国际公司（MSCI Inc.【原文：South Korea remains classified as an emerging market by MSCI Inc., as expected, after a short-selling ban countered efforts by the country to get upgraded to developed status.】

item.title: Sycamore 的 Okada 表示，利率的长期化正在推动公共市场的发展
item.description: Sycamore Tree Capital 的马克-冈田（Mark Okada）周四在彭博电视上说，利率的长期走高使公共市场比私人市场更具吸引力。【原文：Higher-for-longer interest rates are making public markets more attractive than their private peers, Sycamore Tree Capital’s Mark Okada said Thursday on Bloomberg Television.】

item.title: 古尔斯比称，美联储可通过更多像五月份这样的通胀报告来下调利率
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长奥斯汀-古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）表示，如果通胀率像上个月那样继续降温，决策者将能够降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said policymakers will be able to cut interest rates if inflation continues to cool as it did last month.】

item.title: 贸易伙伴因美元走强而挣扎，美国将日本列入货币观察名单
item.description: 美国财政部将日本列入其外汇行为 "监控名单"，但并未将日本或任何其他贸易伙伴列为汇率操纵国。【原文：The US Treasury Department added Japan to its “monitoring list” for foreign-exchange practices, but stopped short of labeling it or any other trade partner as a currency manipulator.】

item.title: 美国证券交易委员会对人工智能的打击预示着涓涓细流将变成洪水猛兽
item.description: 美国最近采取的一系列执法行动很可能只是打击向投资者过度宣传人工智能的公司的开始。【原文：A spate of recent US enforcement actions is likely just the beginning of a crackdown on companies overhyping artificial intelligence to investors.】
